articles.title: About Me
articles.contents:
Work Experience
Researcher and Statistician, CivicDataLabMay, '20 - Present

Using public finance data to investigate, advocate and advance child education and well being in rural India.

Core Team Member, DataKindJul, '18 - Oct, '20

Pro bono consulting and community collaboration on social innovation data science projects.

Data Analyst, Pratham BooksJul, '18 - May, '20

Analytics strategy and architecture for the organisation’s open source and open content digital platform, StoryWeaver.

Data Fellow, Uptake.orgMar, '19 - Sep, '19

6-month data science fellowship program to enhance the user retention on Pratham Books’ StoryWeaver.

Education
B.Sc. (H) Statistics, Sri Venkateswara College, University of DelhiJul, '11 - May, '14
Engagements
Guest Lecturer, Srishti Institute of Art, Design and Technology

Data driven design and real world applications.

Data Privacy Primer

Session on the basics of internet privacy, the landscape and individual action.

See Resume

TheDataAreClean

What I want you to know about me.

This website is built using built using the distill package in R.
Distill
Distill for R Markdown is based on the Distill web framework, which was originally created for use in the Distill Machine Learning Journal. Distill for R Markdown combines the technical authoring features of Distill with R Markdown, enabling a fully reproducible workflow based on literate programming.
Theme
The theme is inspired (read copied) from Miles McBain’s blog Before I Sleep.
